children.text: Insert information of the player you'd like to add below

children.onClick: {{Post_New_Player.run(() => showAlert('Successfully posted a new player','success'), () => showAlert('Could not post a new player','error'))}}

children.label: enter either: pg, sg, sf, pf, c

children.text: Edit the fields of a player

children.onClick: {{Put_Player.run(() => showAlert('Successfully committed a put!','success'), () => showAlert('Unable to make the proposed change','error'))}}
{{Delete_Player.run(() => showAlert('Player successfully deleted','success'), () => showAlert('Unable to delete player','error'))}}
